mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product_tag_info order by create_time desc

select product.*,pt.`name` AS typeName from product JOIN product_tag_mapper ptm on ptm.product_id = product.id JOIN product_type pt on pt.id = product.product_type_id where NOW() > product.expiration_begin_time and product.expiration_time >= NOW() and product.status in (1,2) and ptm.tag_id = #{tagId} ORDER BY product.sort_num
